meanings.definition: The position or role of an assistant.
meanings.sent1: Her assistantship involved organizing files and answering calls.
meanings.sent2: In the office, everyone respected her assistantship.
meanings.sent3: The cat offered its assistantship by bringing a toy mouse to the owner.
meanings.sent4: His assistantship was like a guiding light in the busy workplace.
meanings.sent5: The assistantship of the firefighter saved many lives during the fire.

meanings.definition: The act of assisting or helping.
meanings.sent1: The assistantship of the volunteers made the event run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She showed great assistantship by offering to carry the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The assistantship of the robot vacuum cleaner amused the children.
meanings.sent4: Her assistantship was a beacon of hope in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The assistantship of the nurse brought comfort to the patients.

meanings.definition: The state of being an assistant.
meanings.sent1: His assistantship was appreciated by all his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She took on the assistantship with dedication and enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The assistantship of the squirrel in gathering nuts was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: In the play, her assistantship was portrayed as crucial to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The assistantship of the student in the lab experiments was commendable.
